text.section: A judgment of restitution that a circuit court orders under Part I of this subtitle shall be recorded and indexed in the civil judgment index by the clerk of the circuit court as a money judgment as the Maryland Rules provide.

A judgment of restitution that is recorded and indexed in the civil judgment index as a money judgment under subsection (a) of this section:
in the county of entry of the judgment, is a lien from the date of entry in the amount of the judgment on the restitution obligor's interest in land located in the county of the entry of the judgment; but
in a county other than the county of entry of the judgment, is a lien from the date of recording in the amount of the judgment on the restitution obligor's interest in land located in that county.
